name: Elite Activ Hydrate - Citrus
description:
LongDescription

What is Activ Hydrate?

When we sweat during exercise we not only lose vital fluid but we also release tiny electronically charged particles that are collectively referred to as electrolytes. Electrolytes are important minerals and nutrients such as sodium, magnesium, potassium and calcium that play a vital role in hydration. Activ Hydrate has been developed to help replenish lost electrolytes and aid in hydration.

Why is ours better?

Each low calorie tablet quickly dissolves in water to deliver a highly refreshing drink, flavoured subtly with natural citrus fruits. Each tablet contains 300mg sodium, 100mg potassium, 40mg calcium and 20mg magnesium.

A range you can trust

This product has undergone rigorous testing by LGC’s world−class sports anti−doping laboratory, Sport and Specialised Analytical Services, for a wide range of substances banned by the World Anti−Doping Agency (WADA’) to provide the highest levels of assurance possible for athletes.

 

Made in the UK.

KeyFeatures

  • Delicious fruit flavoured electrolyte drink
  • Contains 300mg sodium
  • Replenishes the essential electrolytes, calcium, magnesium and potassium
  • Informed Sport accredited

Directions of use

Dissolve one tablet in 500ml of water, or the dosage advised by your nutritionist. Up to four tablets can be taken daily.

ProductInformation

Actives Per tablet
Calcium 40mg
Magnesium 20mg
Potassium 100mg
Sodium 300mg

Information table

Actives Per tablet
Calcium 40mg
Magnesium 20mg
Potassium 100mg
Sodium 300mg

Ingredients and potential allergens

Citrus Twist flavour: Citric Acid, Sodium Bicarbonate, Bulking Agent: E420, Flavouring: (Natural Blood Orange [Maltodextrin, Flavouring Preparations, Silicon Dioxide, Natural Flavouring Substances], Natural Lemon [Maltodextrin, Sucrose, Acacia Gum, Flavouring Preparations, Glyceryl Triacetate, Alpha Tocopherol]’), Potassium Chloride, Bulking Agent: E421, Calcium Prep. (Calcium Carbonate, Maltodextrin’), Magnesium Prep. (Magnesium Carbonate, Starch’), Starch, Sweetener: Sucralose Powder, Colour: Riboflavin. Berry Blast flavour: Citric Acid, Sodium Bicarbonate, Bulking Agent: Sorbitol, Potassium Chloride, Flavouring: (Natural Strawberry Flavour, Natural Cherry Flavour, Natural Raspberry Flavour’),Colour: Redbeet Powder (Beetroot Juice Concentrate, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid’), Calcium Prep. (Calcium Carbonate, Maltodextrin’), Magnesium Prep. (Magnesium Carbonate, Starch’), Starch, Sweetener: Sucralose Powder, Colour: Riboflavin.

Warnings and additional information

If you are taking any prescribed medication of have any medical conditions always consult your doctor or pharmacist before taking vitamins and supplements.

Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

Store in a cool dry place, in original packaging, out of sight and reach of young children.

If you experience an adverse reaction, stop taking the supplement and seek medical advice.

Made in the UK for Healthspan Ltd PO Box 64 Guernsey GY1 3BT?

name: Elite All Blacks Plant-Based HiLO® Protein Bar - Black Forest Gateau
description:
LongDescription

Plant−Based HiLO® Protein Bar

Get your protein fix on−the−go with these delicious and plant−based protein bars, suitable for vegans. Ideal for convenient snacking, each bar contains a whopping 20g plant−based protein sourced from pea and soya protein isolate, 7.2g of fibre, and only 1g of naturally occurring sugars. Vegan bars are becoming more popular due to the rise in plant−based lifestyles, plus plant proteins such as pea and soya providing a more sustainable source of protein. Unfortunately, these benefits sometimes come at the cost of taste! We are happy to report that we’ve sourced a plant−based bar that is not only high in protein and low in sugar, but also tastes great, with indulgent and delicious natural flavours.

Clean, lean, green

It was important for us to launch a range with the All Blacks that shared our mutual values. This led to the ‘clean, lean, green’ ethos: our HiLO® Protein Bars are Informed Sport approved with natural flavours (Clean’), science−backed formulations low in sugar to help you achieve your goals (Lean’) and use plant−based protein to ensure vegans can enjoy them too (Green’).

A range you can trust

This product has undergone rigorous testing by LGC’s world−class sports anti−doping laboratory, Sport and Specialised Analytical Services, for a wide range of substances banned by the World Anti−Doping Agency (WADA’) to provide the highest levels of assurance possible for athletes.

KeyFeatures

  • 20g vegan protein per bar
  • Only 1g of naturally occurring sugar
  • Contains 7.2g fibre per bar
  • Delicious natural and indulgent flavours
